job description:
Data Analyst - Merchandise Finance

My client, a Fortune 100 leader in the retail industry, is looking for a Data Analyst to join their team for a 1-year project in Deerfield, IL.

Responsibilities:

· Responsible for coordinating internal merchants' vendor deals.

· Coordinates all aspects of the deal writing process.

· Learns to understand aspects of vendor deals, P&L impact, crediting and researching deal performance issues.

· Applies defined processes for accurate data entry and provides timely information to merchants, accounting and other stakeholders.

· Notifies merchants when terms between parties do not match and recommends corrective action for the merchants.

· Ensures data integrity, resolution of system issues, compliance with applicable laws and validation of vendor funding.

· Adjusts within rapidly changing environment.

· Coordinates vendor deals and timely deal execution with merchant team.

· Communicates with merchant team members to ensure billing and calculation terms meet the negotiated intent.

· Independently identifies deal exceptions and problem solves issues prior to deal billing.

· Reinforces each stakeholder's role to ensure his or her part is played correctly in the multi-step deal process.

· Serves as subject matter expert on deal writing process.

· Escalates issues when necessary.

· Maintains accurate records of individual desk rules and vendor exceptions for billing accuracy.

· Reviews and corrects any deals which are not performing correctly.

· Participates in training of individual team members as needed.

· Maintains knowledge and proficiency on computer systems including Deal Ledger System, Deal Entry System, ADR7, BDRS, Alfresco, and Microsoft Office (Excel and Word).
